trends: There have been 24 other sightings in Oakland
There were no other sightings in Oakland on or around January 31st 2013
Summary: Very large, dark triangle, 3 lights (one at each angle). Moved from Oakland, CA toward San Leandro, CA (east/so. east) directly overhead.
divs: sighting detailsi was standing in our street with my partner and neighbor, at approximately 6:20-30 p.m., jan. 31, 2013 on our way to a concert. we were talking and for some reason i looked up, saw a very large, dark triangle, 3 lights (one at each angle), moving very silently. it moved from oakland, ca toward san leandro, ca (east\so. east) directly overhead. as i noticed what it was, i pointed it out to my friends and as i did, the lights went dark, and it was as if the craft "cloaked" and disappeared. the two people i was with were talking and by the time i could point it out, there was no sign of the lights, just darkness and then stars reappeared.
